faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.a1: ClipForge accepts MP4, MOV and AVI files up to 500 MB. Most videos from smartphones, cameras and recording software work right away.
faq.q2: How long does it take to generate a clip?
faq.a2: Transcription typically takes 1 to 3 minutes depending on the video length. Clip generation happens in a few seconds directly in your browser.
faq.a3: Yes. Your videos are stored in a private space accessible only by your account. We use Supabase with strict security policies (Row Level Security).
faq.q4: Is the processing done on your servers?
faq.a4: Transcription and AI analysis go through our secure servers. Video editing (cutting, subtitles, cropping) is done entirely in your browser using FFmpeg WASM — your videos are not sent to a third-party server.
faq.a5: Absolutely. You can change the font, size, colors, outline, position and background. You can also save presets to reuse on your future clips.
faq.q6: Can I cancel my Pro subscription?
faq.a6: Yes, at any time. You keep access to Pro features until the end of the paid period, then your account automatically reverts to the free plan.
